deltas.title: Shift external JEPA comparison details to REE_convergence
deltas.proposal: Keep canonical JEPA contracts in REE_assembly while moving source-level comparison and glossary draft detail to REE_convergence.
deltas.rationale: Reduces duplicate narratives and keeps unresolved external intake out of canonical architecture docs.

deltas.title: Require convergence packet references for JEPA canonical changes
deltas.proposal: When IMPL-020 or IMPL-022 are materially changed based on external sources, require a convergence packet reference in planning/changelog context.
deltas.rationale: Creates auditable evidence lineage between external intake and canonical REE updates.

decisions.notes: Promote only governance/process deltas now; keep architecture semantics gated behind existing adjudication flow.
